title: Interview: Tom Bilyeu on the London Real with Brian Rose
description: This is a rebroadcast of Tom Bilyeu's interview at the London Real. Tom talks about his struggles with a fixed mindset when living in London, why he branched off from Inside Quest to Impact Theory, and the books and tools that helped him develop a growth mindset.   TOPICS MENTIONED 25 Steps to Living a Life of Impact - http://bit.ly/2ubknRe   TOM'S BOOK RECOMMENDATIONS “Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind” - http://amzn.to/2vmIom5  “The Power of Myth” - http://amzn.to/2uoxXkB “Man's Search for Meaning” - http://amzn.to/2tThmVG Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow - http://amzn.to/2toYMBh   PEOPLE Wyclef Jean - https://goo.gl/w2gxsn Tim Ferris - https://goo.gl/N57pi4 GaryVaynerchuk - http://bit.ly/2scDtWv  David Goggins - https://goo.gl/UGkxtq David Foster Wallace “This is water” - https://goo.gl/cjowVp Simon Sinek “Millennials” -https://goo.gl/MHeFXE   ORGANIZATIONS Quest Nutrition - https://goo.gl/TdFYup Virgin - https://goo.gl/ShwFEh Disney - https://goo.gl/LfEO   Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.   FOLLOW TOM BILYEU TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iyjY5P INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2j7vqX8 FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2hPStWo   SHOP: http://bit.ly/2rtRN8T   FACEBOOK GROUP: http://bit.ly/2rg1AjM   TOM BILYEU READING LIST: http://bit.ly/2rZdpO9   FOLLOW IMPACT THEORY TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iC5lN3 INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2hPSGJa FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2iystOf   Subscribe to the PODCAST: http://apple.co/2icO5wz
